credit_line: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
dimensions: Frame H x W: 21.3 x 26 cm (8 3/8 x 10 1/4 in.)
title: Sampler
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Bought by Mrs. Wiltbank, 1922.
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description: At the top, Viva Gesu, followed by alphabets and numerals divided by small floral bands. In the lower register, symbols of the crucifixion, a grape arbor, deer, and a house.
name: Sampler
